Text: Is it in 4 videos so that you can upload it faster? I'm assuming 1 per quarter of the game.
@bullit199, yes each video represents a quarter with the file names 1-4. Hopefully people can start watching the game, while continuing the download of later quarters.
Thanks for uploading this so quickly! Totally forgot to set my DVR.
I don't know how long it takes to edit & upload these games... BUT I APPRECIATE IT BRO
